profile.summary: I am a Computer Engineering student at CUHK-Shenzhen with a passion for AI, Computer Graphics, and Game Development. I love building intelligent systems and immersive virtual worlds.
profile.about: I am an undergraduate student at The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen, majoring in Computer Engineering. My academic journey has led me to explore the fascinating intersections of Artificial Intelligence and Computer Graphics. I have hands-on experience in developing character control systems for metaverse applications and analyzing network security data. I am proficient in Python, C#, and Java, and I enjoy solving complex problems through code.

experience.description: Led the Character Controller development group for the 'CUHK-Shenzhen Metaverse' project. Completed the character control system and full system integration.

Collaborated on building the initial server environment (Redis, Spark, Docker, Neo4j). Developed a subsystem to extract AS autonomous domain relationships from DNS logs, enabling a complete pipeline from raw logs to graph database visualization.
Developed automated tools using Python for face recognition data cleaning and rough edge annotation, significantly improving team efficiency. The tool was recognized and adopted by the company.
